resources: QuizApp Answer these questions and learn how much you know about Android! Here we go! The quiz contains open questions as well as single and multiple choice answers The result you will be able to post on social networking sites or send in private messages. Before start the quiz, please fill out the form below. These data will be used to generate the final message. Name START x a b r d h c a Welcome to ANDROID QUIZ APP! Question 1: Which unit should we use to resize the text? dp sp px dpi Question 2: Which of the following variables can be use for store a numeric value: 2.33 float double String Double Question 3: What view will allow you to scroll screen content? Put your answer here Question 4: Which of following views are view groups? LinearLayout RelativeLayout TextView NumberView Question 5: What method do you use for checking if checkbox is marked? isMarked() isChecked() isChecket() isTrue() Enter your name Question 6: Can we simulate SD card in Android? No, only physical device can be used AVD has SD card by default Check SD Card Option and specify memory for the same None of the above Qustion 7: How can we use custom colors in application? It is not possible Use layout file and specify color value Use XML file and specify color value Use Java file Qustion 8: How can we bring up a pop up a menu? Qustion 9: Why are intent filters written? To find a suitable component It will call a service In dynamic broadcast receiver It will always start a new task Qustion 10: How can a thread in Android be stopped? stop() wait() suspend() return from run() on boolean flag=false Check Answers Udacity Quiz ProjectsUdacity Quiz Project
